achievements.name: Shoot Them Down
achievements.description: Kill 50 minions while they are in the air.

achievements.name: Home Sweet Home
achievements.description: Place 100 guardians in their home locations.

achievements.name: Freeloader
achievements.description: Win 1 match with all 3 free starter heroes.

achievements.name: Fearless Leader
achievements.description: Win 5 games as a party leader.

achievements.name: Rift Buster
achievements.description: Destroy or help to destroy 100 unstable rifts.

achievements.name: Ring of Fire
achievements.description: Catch 75 minions on fire at the same time with Smolder.

achievements.name: Pardon My Reach
achievements.description: Kill 250 minions ensnared by Reach of Roots with Ivy.

achievements.name: Good CATCH!
achievements.description: Deal 2000 damage to an enemy with a single CATCH! by Hogarth.

achievements.name: Moneymaker
achievements.description: Pick up 1000 coin bags with Dobbin.

achievements.name: Out of Sight
achievements.description: Stay in Prowl for a total of 60min as Midnight.

achievements.name: Very Blessed
achievements.description: Pick up 250 mana orbs with Stinkeye.

achievements.name: Book Ended
achievements.description: Knock 1,000 minions into battleground hazards with Zoey's Book Club.

achievements.name: Soul Collecting
achievements.description: Collect 500 soul stacks in a single match with Oziel.

achievements.name: Touched by Can't Touch This
achievements.description: Deal 20,000 in damage to minions with Can't Touch This.

achievements.name: Beauty and Beast
achievements.description: Deal 200,000 damage in a single match with Bionka.

achievements.name: Air-Blackpaw
achievements.description: Kill a minion in midair with Blackpaw's Pounce.

achievements.name: Un-Unchained
achievements.description: Five star a master or rift lord battleground without any players going Unchained.

achievements.name: Forever Unchained
achievements.description: Be Unchained for a total of 1 hour.

achievements.name: Hazard Play
achievements.description: Kill 1,000 minions by knocking them into battleground hazards.

achievements.name: Landslide
achievements.description: Roll 250,000 meters in battle with Tundra's Avalanche.

achievements.name: Kill-netic
achievements.description: Kill 30 enemies within 1s of using Gabriella's Kinetic Pulse.

achievements.name: Wraith Wrath
achievements.description: Deal 1,000 damage with Oziel's Wraith Surge.

achievements.name: Kobolds on Strike
achievements.description: Kill 100 kobolds with Midnight's Shadow Swipe.

achievements.name: Simply Slamming
achievements.description: Kill 5,000 enemies with Slam It Down.

achievements.name: Star Search
achievements.description: Earn 3 or more stars on every rift lord battleground.

achievements.name: Shoot for the Stars
achievements.description: Earn 3 or more stars on every war mage battleground.

achievements.name: Big Bang
achievements.description: Kill 150 enemies in 1 match with Dobbin's Spare Dynamite.

achievements.name: STILL ANGRY!
achievements.description: Earn 50 stacks of ANGRY! at once with Hogarth.

achievements.name: Pounce and Bounce
achievements.description: Use Blackpaw's Pounce 1,000 times during battle.

achievements.name: Skill Shots
achievements.description: Kill 500 enemies by knocking them into hazards with Ivy's Penetrating Arrow.

achievements.name: Frequent Frenzier
achievements.description: Use Bloodspike's Homicidal Frenzy 30x during battle.

achievements.name: Deep Fried
achievements.description: Deal damage to 1,000 enemies with Smolder using naphtha.

achievements.name: Adoring Fans
achievements.description: Mesmerize 50 enemies with a single Devious Allure from Gabriella.

achievements.name: Faces Down
achievements.description: Kill 50 enemies with a single In Your Faces from Maximilian.

achievements.name: Extra Crispy
achievements.description: Deal damage with 1,000 gallons of boiling oil.

achievements.name: Starstruck
achievements.description: Earn 3 or more stars on every master battleground.

achievements.name: Soul Searching
achievements.description: Collect 2,000 soul stacks in 1 match with Oziel.

achievements.name: Anomalous Apocalypse
achievements.description: Kill 1,000 enemies with Stinkeye's Arcane Anomaly.

achievements.name: Rush and Crush
achievements.description: Kill 500 enemies by knocking them into hazards with Temper's Bull Rush.

achievements.name: Bottled Up
achievements.description: Reach max rage with Rage of the Forge 50x.

achievements.name: Wakey Wakey
achievements.description: Resurrect 10 teammates with scroll of resurrection.

achievements.name: Scroll Loophole
achievements.description: Prevent the loss of 50 rift points with scroll of the empty rift.

achievements.name: Firey Surprise
achievements.description: Kill 500 enemies with Smolder's From the Ashes.

achievements.name: Ogre Overkill
achievements.description: Kill 50 full-health ogres with Bloodspike's Stunning Execution.

achievements.name: Through and Through
achievements.description: Hit 5,000 enemies with Ivy's penetrating arrow.

achievements.name: Gnoll Army
achievements.description: Summon 100 gnolls during battle with Blackpaw.

achievements.name: Shortcut to Win
achievements.description: Use Dobbin's Mineshaft Shortcut 200x in a match he wins.

achievements.name: Distance Dash
achievements.description: Run 26.2 miles with Midnight's Dash and Slash during battle.

achievements.name: Undeclared
achievements.description: Change magic school in battle 250x as Zoey.

achievements.name: Pet from Hell
achievements.description: Kill 500 enemies with Zoey's pet, Feebee.

achievements.name: Henpecked
achievements.description: Get stunned by Zoey's Chaos Tome backfiring 15x during battle.

achievements.name: Till It Hurts
achievements.description: Deal 25,000 damage to Oziel using Oziel's Essence Siphon.

achievements.name: Sabotage 101
achievements.description: Achieve level 5 to unlock Sabotage mode.

achievements.name: Bouncy Bouncy Bombs
achievements.description: Hit 5000 enemies with Deadeye's Bouncing Bomb.

achievements.name: Forever Infamous
achievements.description: Obtain 1000 stacks of Infamy with Deadeye.

achievements.name: Move.  NOW!
achievements.description: Use Deadeye's "Outta the Way" ability 500x in combat.

achievements.name: Chaining Chain Lightning
achievements.description: Kill 2500 minions with Cygnus's Chain Lightning ability.

achievements.name: Emperor's Reach
achievements.description: Use Yi-Lin's Imperial Reach ability 100x in combat.

achievements.name: Tempest-est Strike
achievements.description: Hit 2500 enemies with Yi-Lin's Tempest Strike ability.

achievements.name: Heavy Weapons
achievements.description: Kill 2,500 enemies with Brass using Cannonball.

achievements.name: Joint Bank Account
achievements.description: Pickup 500 of Dobbin's coins as Brass.
